# gravity

**Instance Property**

The gravity acceleration vector expressed in the device’s reference frame.

## Declaration

```swift
var gravity: CMAcceleration { get }
```

## Discussion

The total acceleration of the device is equal to gravity plus the acceleration the user imparts to the device ([doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMDeviceMotion/userAcceleration]).

## Getting Acceleration Data

- **userAcceleration**: The acceleration that the user is giving to the device.
